reviews.review: tiene muchos errores, solo por eso dejas de jugarlo...

Dead by Daylight, Лучшая игра в своем роде, когда у тебя 4 ранг тебя кидают к 20 рангам, когда маньяк немного дурак  и он не пытается тебя пойма, ты быстро чинишь и уходишь но с тебя снимают ранг - каплю, интересно почему!?
Вот именно по тому что разработчики кладут хуй на здравый смысл, зачем калибровать по скиллу.

Каждое новое обновление НОВЫЙ БАГ УХ!
Новая карта, она не понятная я про то что тут нет баланса чуть-чуть.
Сурвы занерфлины в 0.

Короче не рекомендую эту игру, за 500 рублей так точно, я в рот ебал такие пранки.
it has more pros than cons, even though the cons can be annoying

Some people DC because rage quitting so that's a drag. But if you play with friends there's lots of fun to be had and can be a pretty chill game. Very co-op team oriented so its good to play with people you trust/ know will help you.
Un juego genial si te gusta levelear a tu personaje tiene muchisimas cosas y es entretenido lo recomiendo muchisimo!

This is a really good game.
One thing probably bad about it is it is heavily dependent on the number of online players.
Playing with your friends as survivors and waiting for a server will mostly take a long time.

I don't know how the developers can do about it though.

I'VE PLAYED 4 GAMES AND I CAN'T EARN ANYTHING BECAUSE OF STUPID ERROR 112 ABOUT A FAILED TRANSACTION WHICH I DIDN'T EVEN DO!!!
Хорошая игра.Особенно когда играешь компанией своих друзей

de los mejores juegos con los que me haya topado en la vida lastimosamente casi 4 años despues logro tenerlo para aquellos que decidan comprar este juego haran una gran inversion al agregarlo a su biblioteca de productos de steam

我手机第五人格来的，好玩归好玩，匹配时间对我来说太长了，而且角色基本必须氪金才行，肝基本不可能，平衡性和第五比好的不只一点半点，好评，希望官方把角色价格低一点，匹配时间短一些，你弄些人机也行啊
黎明杀机是真不错啊，真不错

It's a very good game, consistent amount of entertainment. I have almost no complaints except for that there are some balancing issues. A big complaint I have is the waiting time for killer, I don't wanna have to sit there and wait 10-20 minutes. That's my only complaint as of writing this review
只有前10h是真正的恐怖游戏，后面就是欢乐的遛与被遛orz
God tier game don't let anyone tell you otherwise. Dev's are cool and come up with a lot of ways to spice the game up and core game play is solid
Fun as fuck but dedicated serves SUCKSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS
very fun game. hit boxes can sometimes be aggravating however the base core and mechanics are addicting and fun.
im in love with this game

100 Hours of Infinite fun. 
have some bugs , dev's are lazy... still this game will give you inevitably chill time .
Игра полное гавнище на ровне с Dead by daylight . А стоп это же один и тот же лютый калл. Читеров дофига и еще ебл*нская система всего что есть
Eu amo esse jogo, recomendo muito
after almost a year of not playing my review has changed on this game it is fun playing as the killer but I do not like playing as the survivors
I'm a Oni main. Game is entertaining with friends, can be both fun and frustrating by yourself.
很不错的一款游戏，中间陆陆续续退过几次，不过现在又回来玩了，就是国服挂B有点多

Terrifying but fun! If you have a group of 5 to play with you can play custom matches, which I think are more enjoyable paired with voice chat so you can joke with friends (and also hear them scream). I was on the edge about this game as I'm TERRIFIED of most scary/thriller games but after about 30 mins of playing and understanding the controls better my heart stopped beating like I had been running a marathon. 

LOVE LOVE LOVE the new added DLC (Stranger Things and Silent Hill specifically)

好玩 不能只有我玩到
oni is a bitch but lo key game fun asf

Make your choice doesn't activate when I facecamp annoying survivors that loop me
this game is fucking garbage fix your game shit devs
esse jogo é uma merda, todo final de jogo eu não ganho absolutamente nada (tem um bug que ninguém sabe como resolver e simplesmente até agora não recebi uma resposta).
比第五人格有趣多了，第五模式太死板了，三人摸机，一人溜鬼等等局局相似，至少杀鸡里常常多人修一台机子（游戏优化比第五好太多）

É um jogo divertido de jogar, mas um dos problemas são alguns bugs que acabam ocorrendo. Mas se você tiver amigos para jogar vai render várias risadas e rages quando o assassino mata você e os seus amigos.
fuck the hag but fun aye
Honestly, it's a pretty good game. Rarely does it make me jump or get scared (and I get scared easily) but it doesn't change how much I really love this game.
é um otimo jogo, recomendo comprar.
jogo bom mas to sem amigos pra jogar,se quiser só add steam ou discord: Marine#8670
Really good game overall been playing it for a while on all platforms and the new licensed killer is amazing recommend this game to anyone who likes survivor killer based horror games.
very fun good game, worth buying but find friends to play it with in custom matchmaking and public

The devs have finally started listening to the community and after six+ months, they have patched the "sync error" and "rank update error". 

You may experience several bugs and notice that your hit box is the size of the map but that is soon to get a rework too. a few weeks back I hated the game and was ready to uninstall it for good, recently though, there have been a lot of good changes and I expect more to come.

If the game becomes awful again, i doubt it deserves a second chance :/

Best game ever , 1 years already i still having best feeling to play with my mate we have every good time, sometime people do some shit as trolling, camping, .... but its all ok btw, its a life. Oh wellllllllllllllllll

It is a fun game, with a fun and well thought idea behind the lore and gameplay, however, i do have some warnings to make:

1) If u have a bad time dealing with loses and/or furstrating rounds, i advise you to think twice before buying. I am one big sore loser and some rounds stress me out of my mind.
2) The community is VERY toxic, with people calling you bad names or a noob for wining or losing, either way they menage to swear at you or teabag, and so on
3) From my personal experience, the killers get scrapped badly on the end game. In my opinion, the survivors have more efficient means of wining rounds at higher ranks, which results in very upseting rounds with killers. I was looking foward to play with killers and have fun but, as the ranks get higher, that experience got severely ruined for me.
Again, this is all my personal experience, but i hope i can give some insight to someone
My advice is not to buy this game, as minutes of fun will turn into hour of frustration and anger. Do not buy.

game has become horrible after the update, never thought the day would come where id install this game and NO, its not because of Deadhard, its everything about the update

DO NOT GET THIS GAME UNLESS YOU HATE YOURSELF
Great Game para jogar com amiguinhos se for comprar pra jogar solo nao recomendo vai enjoar rapido
Amazingly thrilling. 9/10. Would be 10/10 if you didnt get the occasional over powered killer or survivor.
i will and i have recommended this game to other people. its a great game. heart races when i play it
